message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I understand its worth to you is $1,500,000, and I'm willing to offer it to you at a slightly discounted price of $1,550,000. This represents a significant opportunity for you, and I'm confident you'll find the product to be a valuable asset. Please consider my offer carefully. If you decline, I have another buyer lined up who is ready to purchase at full market value.
